name: Caissa
description:
Can you make your way through the waves of monsters while protecting your non-magical little sister? Use tactical skill to outsmart and defeat your opponent in this magical chess-lite rogue-lite. 

While on a mission in the dark dimension, Mizuki discovers that her little sister Maya accidently came along too. Since she has no powers, it's up to Mizuki and her friends to protect Maya until they make it back home.

Build up your team of different magical girls based on both classical and custom chess pieces, then place them how you'd like to best survive the next encounter.

Made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #6
